pull.title: qt: Display minimum ping in debug window.
pull.body: Adds minimum ping to the debug information, and replaces the last ping with the minimum ping in the node list.

events.message: Display minimum ping in debug window.

events.body: Why replacing? Isn't the last ping time more valuable? Why renaming the member variable?

rename.from: Display minimum ping in debug window.
rename.to: qt: Display minimum ping in debug window.
